.thin-line {
  height: 1px;
  background: #000;
  transform: scaleY(0.5);
  transform-origin: 0 0;
}

.container::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  height: 1px;
  background: #ccc;
  transform: scaleY(0.5);
}

.border-line {
  border-top: 0.5px solid #ddd;
}

/* 兼容性处理 */
@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2) {
  .border-line {
    border-top: 0.5px solid #ddd;
  }
}

.shadow-line {
  box-shadow: 0 0.5px 0 #ccc;
}

/* 四边细线 */
.all-sides {
  box-shadow: 
    0 0.5px 0 #ccc,
    0 -0.5px 0 #ccc;
}

.mobile-line::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  height: 1px;
  background: #e0e0e0;
  transform: scaleY(0.5);
}

@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 3) {
  .mobile-line::after {
    transform: scaleY(0.33);
  }
}

function supportsHalfPixel() {
  const test = document.createElement('div');
  test.style.border = '0.5px solid transparent';
  document.body.appendChild(test);
  
  const supported = getComputedStyle(test).borderTopWidth === '0.5px';
  document.body.removeChild(test);
  
  return supported;
}
